leftover.translation[0].definitions[0].d: remaining after all the rest has been used, taken, or eaten
leftover.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a few pieces of leftover carpet
leftover.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something from an earlier time that still remains, even though it is not really useful or important anymore
leftover.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The headmaster was a leftover from the Victorian era.
